message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. Based on my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $1,300,000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand your budget considerations.  While the product is truly valuable at $1,400,000, I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair deal for both of us.
